snippet: The commission is frustrated that a prosecutor has blocked the release of its report on sexual harassment accusations against Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez.
abstract: New York State ethics regulators, frustrated that their report examining allegations of sexual harassment by Assemblyman Vito J Lopez has not been released to the public, say they will disclose it themselves if the Legislature and prosecutors fail to do so; ethics commission is new and seeking to establish its credibility.
lead_paragraph: The commission is frustrated that a prosecutor has blocked the release of its report on sexual harassment accusations against Assemblyman Vito J. Lopez.

headline.seo: Ethics Panel Vows to Release Report on Lopez in Harassment Inquiry
headline.main: Ethics Panel, Upset by Delay, Vows to Release Report on Lopez
headline.print_headline: Ethics Panel Vows Release Of Its Report On Lopez
